Present

Right now, I'm exploring the next generation of Virtual DOM with 🦁 Million.js.

In the summer of 2022, I'll be interning at ▲ Vercel to help work on projects in the Next.js ecosystem and learn more about the bleeding edge of web development.

Previously

I won the 2nd place grand award in Systems Software at the 2021 International Science and Engineering Fair (ISEF) with 🙋‍♀️ Lucia.js out of 1.8k+ students around the world.

I pioneered 🧠 KBowl (virtual Knowledge Bowl events) during the COVID-19 lockdown. I helped organize the K-12 leagues for Washington State, consisting of 30+ schools, 40+ teachers and 1k+ students, throughout 2020 and 2021.
